All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    BadVaultFormatException
    BadVaultFormatException is a subclass of the Exception class with the task of handling errors relating to improper formatting of the supplied vault file.
    Caesar
    A class that supports the Vigenere Cipher by performing encryption and decryption using the Vigenere algorithm.
    CaesarHash
    A class that supports Shift+Caesar Hashes.
    Clear
    A class that supports the Clear Algorithm which is essentially no encryption or decryption.
    ClearHash
    A class that supports the Clear Hash.
    Data
    A class used to define the Data object that stores data entries read in from a Vault file.
    EncryptionException
    EncryptionException is a subclass of the Exception class with the task of handling errors relating to the encryption algorithms.
    EncryptionInventory
    A class used to store all the Encryption Algorithms
    Encryptor
    An Interface for the Encryption Algorithms Sourced from: IC211 Project 2
    Hasher
    An Interface for the Hashing Algorithms
    HashException
    HashException is a subclass of the Exception class with the task of handling errors relating to the hashing algorithms.
    HashInventory
    A class used to store all the Hashing Algorithms
    InvalidCharException
    InvalidCharException is a subclass of the Exception class with the task of handling errors relating to invalid ASCII Characters outside of the range 42-122.
    Mechanism
    A class used to support the Caesar and Vigenere Encryption Algorithms taht both rely on the same individual character encryption method.
    TestEncryptors  
    TestHashers  
    User
    A class used to define the User object that stores user entries read in from a Vault file.
    Vault
    The primary program of this project containing a Main function and private helper methods used to read in a Vault file, and authenticate a user from the Vault file using console input.
    Vigenere
    A class that supports the Vigenere Cipher by performing encryption and decryption using the Vigenere algorithm.
    VigenereHash
    A class that supports Shift+Vigenere Hashes.
